title: Get trending videos related to hashtags

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: advertiser_id
parameters.description: Advertiser ID. Pass one of the advertiser IDs returned via advertiser_ids from /oauth2/access_token/ .

parameters.name: discovery_type
parameters.description: The type of discovery item. Enum values: HASHTAG : hashtag-related videos.

parameters.name: hashtag_ids
parameters.description: A list of hashtag IDs. Max size: 10. Pass one or more popular hashtag IDs obtained via hashtag_id from /discovery/trending_list/ . Example: ["4268426520694"] .

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: Location code. Default value: US . Pass one of the location codes returned via top_country_list from /discovery/trending_list/ .

parameters.name: date_range
parameters.description: The timeframe in which the videos have been popular. Enum values: 1DAY : last 1 day. 7DAY : last 7 days. 30DAY : last 30 days. 120DAY : last 120 days. Default value: 7DAY .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: list
fields.description: The list of trending videos using popular hashtags. This object array returns the top 20 videos related to each popular hashtag in the selected region and timeframe.

fields.name: top_video_list
fields.description: The list of trending videos for the hashtag.

fields.name: video_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the TikTok video.

fields.name: embed_url
fields.description: An embeddable link for the TikTok video. This URL can be used to embed the TikTok video in external websites or applications. If the privacy setting of the post is "Friends" or "Only you", the video will not be viewable through this link.

fields.name: share_url
fields.description: A shareable URL for the TikTok video.
